item.title: Character.AI now allows users to talk with AI avatars over calls
item.description:
a16z-backed Character.AI said today that it is now allowing users to talk to AI characters over calls. The feature currently supports multiple languages, including English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Korean, Japanese, and Chinese. The startup tested the calling feature ahead of today’s public launch. During that time, it said that more than 3 million users had […]

item.title: "The expansion of Xbox gaming to Fire TV devices offers players another option," Microsoft surprisingly partners with Amazon to deliver Xbox Cloud Gaming - Windows Central
item.description:
1. "The expansion of Xbox gaming to Fire TV devices offers players another option," Microsoft surprisingly partners with Amazon to deliver Xbox Cloud Gaming  Windows Central
  2. Xbox comes to Amazon Fire TV: Play popular games without a console  About Amazon
  3. Xbox Cloud Gaming is coming to Amazon's Fire TV Sticks in July  The Verge
  4. Amazon's New Fire TV Devices Are Getting an Xbox Cloud Gaming App  IGN
  5. The Xbox app and Game Pass Ultimate library are coming to select Amazon Fire TV devices  TechRadar

item.title: Echo Dot vs. Echo Pop: Which Amazon device is right for you?
item.description: Amazon offers a lineup of smart speakers, with Echo Dot and Echo Pop being two of the most compact. We compare them to determine which is more worth it.
